A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Characters are way out of character. This films continuity doesn't really seem to fit in with the lore. Disney's trying to take something that isn't broken and make it better only ended up deconstructing a beloved galaxy far far away and made it bland and boring. Such a pitty with so much potential only to take a steep nose dive into oblivion a be forgotten. For the millions of fans out there I do not endorse this movie. Wish I hadn't paid so much to watch it. Pure let down.
